firstBanner.titleBanner: Animate Your ideas, Design Better Apps
firstBanner.descriptionBanner: Make it easy to desing animated and interactive user interfaces, Work done for an upcoming NFT marketplace catered to musicians.

secondBanner.title: Join The Presale
secondBanner.description: Take part in our quest to support and get early access

thirdBanner.title: Presale started Jul 06, 2021 01:00 EST - End on May 14, 2021 - 13:00 EST

fourthBanner.title: About Our Currency
fourthBanner.description: The INTRA token is the native token of our platform developed in the Binance Smart Chain network, through it, holders will be able to play our VideoGames and receive rewards for completing missions, earn profits with the use of stacking pool and farming, use it as a means of payment to exchange NFTs, trade cryptos in our Swap.

textOne.title: Intra Swap
textOne.description: Dentro de nuestras plataforma podran realizar trade de criptoactivos al mejor precio de la red y las comisiones mas bajas.

textTwo.title: Yield Farming
textTwo.description: Crearemos una piscina de farming para que puedas proveer liquides que será utilizado en nuestro swap y de esta manera obtener ganancias con las comisiones.

textThree.title: Stacking
textThree.description: Los holders de INTRA tendran la posibilidad de realizar stacking con porcentajes de alto rendimiento Anual, obtener ganancias con nuestro token y con tokens asociados al proyecto.

textFour.title: I.D.O
textFour.description: INTRA contará con una plataforma de Oferta Inicial De Tokens para impulsar la salida al mercado de nuevos proyectos emergentes, evaluados previamente por nuestro staff de profesionales.

sixBanner.title: Presale para empresas
sixBanner.description: Be the first to know about INTRA Currency presale in real time in every country

sevenBanner.title: Conecta tu wallet
sevenBanner.description: INTRA tiene soporte con mas de 20 brokers de wallet en el mundo

miniBannerOne.text: Bienvenido a nuestra comunidad, ya somos mas de 500 en nuestro grupo de Telegram

miniBannerTwo.text: Bienvenido a nuestra comunidad, ya somos mas de 500 en nuestro grupo de Telegram

smOne.title: Digital library of video games.
smOne.description: This is an exclusive space for free access to video games of the most diverse genres, with the possibility of earning INTRA in the process.

smTwo.title: Swap
smTwo.description: All users who have acquired INTRA or another cryptocurrency through mining will be able to swap it for the one they   they want.

smThree.title: Wallet
smThree.description: This will be the interface where you will be able to manage your INTRA: send, receive or view your INTRA balance at any time.

smFour.title: NFT's market
smFour.description: A space designed exclusively for the commercialization of non-fungible tokens, where users can purchase collectibles
